thread.title: Merry Wilson, Legal Assistant
thread.title_full: Blumberg Excelsior, Inc. reviewed by Merry Wilson, Legal Assistant

author: Merry Wilson, Legal Assistant
title: Merry Wilson, Legal Assistant
text: I was recommended this company by someone who works in our office and I was not disappointed! Our representative Jason makes everything simple. He was very helpful when deciding exactly what we needed for the office. Would definitely recommend!
